title: How to save time and memory with BIG Datasets
description: Background  As you know that, The size of the data is large and it takes a long time and memory error occurs.  So I share a study of how to save time and how to reduce memory.  This is my first field of study. So if there is a mistake or something to add, please add it as a comment.
